price: 7. Bazali sé koyeba bomoyi ya mokili mpe babosani oyo ya mokolo mwa suka.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamūna ẓāhiran mina al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum ʿani al-ākhirati hum ghāfilūna
